#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long

using namespace std;

int n;
lli A[103][103];
int vis[103][103][103];
lli dp[103][103][103];
int tc;

int f(int idx, int fs, int sc)
{
    if ( idx == n+1 ) return A[fs][idx] + A[sc][idx];
    if ( vis[idx][fs][sc] == tc ) return dp[idx][fs][sc];
    vis[idx][fs][sc] = tc;
    lli ans = A[fs][idx] + f(idx+1,idx,sc);
    ans = min(ans, A[sc][idx] + f(idx+1,fs, idx));
    dp[idx][fs][sc] = ans;
    return ans;
}

int main()
{
    int t,x,y;
    lli z,ans,r;
    cin >> t;
    for ( tc = 1; tc <= t; tc++ ) {
        cin >> n >> r;
        for ( int i = 0; i < n+2; i++ ) {
            cin >> x;
            for ( int j = 0; j < n+1; j++ ) {
                cin >> y >> z;
                A[x][y] = z;
            }
        }
        ans = f(1,0,0) + ((long long)(n+1LL))*r;
        cout << "Case " << tc << ": " << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
